pages.text: Astral Sorcery is a magic mod focused around harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations.$(br2)Explore and discover the world and the sky above you; focus starlight to your will, strengthening yourself or enhancing the world around you.
The Astral Tome is your guide to all things Astral Sorcery.
Standard paper is just not up to the quality needed to craft the Astral Tome.  For this you'll need some Parchment.

pages.title: Aquamarine
pages.text: Aquamarine can be found in the form of Aquamarine Shale, often located in the sands of riverbeds and beaches.  They can usually be found close to the surface,  buried in patches of sand.
